question: Can you please supply me with some dua?
answer:
QUESTION
Can you please supply me with some doua that will aid in the retention of my memory.
ANSWER


Share:
Improving the Memory

'My Lord! Expand for me my bossom. Ease my task for me. Remove the knot from my speech so that they may understand what I say.' (Juz 16; Rk11)

for strengthening the memory and progressing in knowledge, recite the above verses 20 times everyday after Fajr Salaat.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
